title: loosing always because of lag
body:
what give man riot?
im always lagging and my internet is fine and i alway lose because of this.
if this continues im gonna have to stop playing

replies.body: I'd recommend looking over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is configured in the best way first. If everything is good there, you might be having a bit of packet loss which we can check with our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).
